task_description: Search for tweets mentioning "E3 announcements."
Follow the official Twitter account of NASA (@NASA).
Retweet a tweet about a SpaceX launch.
Like five tweets from the #TechNews hashtag.
Comment on a tweet about a recent tech keynote.
Save a thread explaining the history of Bitcoin to the Bookmarks section.
Share a tweet about recent climate change data.
Use the Explore tab to find trending news about the NBA Finals.
Turn on notifications for the @elonmusk account.
Create a list named "Tech Influencers" and add @kevinrose, @Scobleizer, and @om.
Follow the official Twitter account for The Guardian newspaper (@guardian).
Share a tweet about an upcoming movie premiere.
Report a tweet that violates Twitter’s community guidelines.
Translate a tweet written in Spanish into English using the translation feature.
Bookmark a tweet with a link to a free Python course.
Search for job openings using the hashtag #Hiring.
Find the price of a new iPhone 13.
Search for a used Canon EOS 5D camera with less than 10,000 shutter actuations.
Filter search results to find the cheapest refurbished MacBook Air 2020.
Check the seller feedback of a highly-rated seller like "best_buy" for their rating and reviews.
Use the "Buy It Now" option to find listings for a Samsung Galaxy S22 Ultra.
Search for an Apple Watch Series 7 that offers expedited shipping to New York.
Find a pair of Nike Air Jordan 1 sneakers in size 10.
Locate a vintage Rolex Submariner watch produced before 1995.
Filter laptop listings to show only items located in the USA.
Search for a LEGO Millennium Falcon set and sort results by lowest price.
Add a Sony PlayStation 5 to the watch list if the auction ends soon.
Search for a Dell XPS 13 with at least 16GB RAM and 512GB SSD.
Look for a Herman Miller Aeron chair in good used condition.
Find a Nintendo Switch console bundle with extra controllers.
Search for a gently used book titled "The Catcher in the Rye" by J.D. Salinger.
Filter listings to find an unlocked Google Pixel 6a smartphone.
Sort listings for the GoPro HERO9 Black by distance from a specific zip code.
Locate a Dyson V11 cordless vacuum cleaner with minimal runtime.
Search for a KitchenAid Stand Mixer with a 5-quart bowl.
Search for software engineering jobs in San Francisco, CA and note the top 3 companies hiring.
Read five recent reviews for Google as an employer.
Check the salary range for Mechanical Engineers in New York, NY using Glassdoor's salary tool.
Find companies with a 4.0 or higher rating in Austin, TX using the company ratings filter.
Look up the most common interview questions for a data analyst position at Facebook.
Compare job benefits between Amazon and Microsoft by reading employee reviews.
Browse job postings for remote customer service roles and save three listings.
View salary estimates for project managers with 5 years of experience in the relevant job listings.
Search for companies offering work-from-home options in the healthcare industry and list three.
Find the company size and founded date for Apple's Glassdoor page in the company overview section.
Read reviews for a Senior Software Developer position at Dropbox and summarize common pros.
Look for companies in Chicago, IL that have been reviewed over 500 times and list three.
Check for open positions in marketing at startups in Silicon Valley and save the job listings.
Look up annual bonuses for financial analysts at JPMorgan Chase in the salary sections.
Browse employee-provided photos for Tesla's work environment.
Identify the top benefits listed for employees at Adobe in the benefits section.
Search for internship opportunities in graphic design in Los Angeles, CA and save the listings.
Compare Glassdoor ratings of different job titles within IBM.
